title: Forests to Faucets
description: A project focused on prioritizing prescribed fire in the Central Sierra Nevada for water quality benefits.
contents:
South Yuba River State Park, Source: Larry MillerAs part of a team of five for our masterâ€™s capstone project, identified three priority watersheds for prescribed fire in the Central Sierra Nevada for prescribed fire to minimize the water quality impacts of high severity wildfire for our client, American Rivers.
Learn more at https://www.forests2faucets.com/.
